card.name: Ass Whuppin'
card.ability: Destroy target silver-bordered permanent in any game you can see from your seat.

card.name: Azorius Guildmage
card.ability:
{2}{W}: Tap target creature.
{2}{U}: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

card.name: Budoka Pupil
card.ability:
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Budoka Pupil.
At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Budoka Pupil, you may flip it.

card.name: Dimir Guildmage
card.ability:
({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.)
{3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
{3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Force of Nature
card.ability:
Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.
card.flavor: "It blinked, and flower petals fill like tears. Harthar, sensing weakness, attacked-and his blood fell like petals." -Shesul Fass, faerie bard

card.name: Ghost-Lit Raider
card.ability:
{2}{R}, {T}: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 2 damage to target creature.
Channel — {3}{R}, Discard Ghost-Lit Raider: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Gruul Guildmage
card.ability:
({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.)
{3}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Gruul Guildmage deals 2 damage to target player.
{3}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Hedge Troll
card.ability:
Hedge Troll gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
{W}: Regenerate Hedge Troll.
card.flavor: His abode was clean and bare, not a morsel in sight. I asked him what he ate, fearing the answer. He smiled and said his faith alone sustained him.
card.ruling: 2/1/2007: This is the timeshifted version of Sedge Troll.

card.name: Ichiga, Who Topples Oaks
card.ability:
Trample.
Remove a ki counter from Ichiga, Who Topples Oaks: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Rukh Egg
card.ability: When Rukh Egg dies, put a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
card.flavor: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004: If the Rukh Egg card is removed from the graveyard in the same turn it is put there, a Bird will still be put onto the battlefield.

10/1/2005: If the Egg is exiled instead of being put into the graveyard, no Bird is put onto the battlefield.

10/1/2005: Text-changing effects can be used to change the color of the Bird that will be put onto the battlefield.

10/1/2005: If the Egg is destroyed while under the control of another player, the controller of the Egg gets the Bird.

card.name: Shivan Dragon
card.ability:
Flying
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

card.name: Shriekmaw
card.ability:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
card.ruling: 4/15/2013: If you cast this card for its evoke cost, you may put the sacrifice trigger and the regular enters the battlefield trigger on the stack in either order.

card.name: Storm Entity
card.ability:
Haste
Storm Entity enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.
card.flavor: Dweldian magi don't enter the Realm of Thrones when they die. Instead their souls are drawn to great works of magic.
card.ruling: 5/1/2007: The number of other spells cast this turn is determined as Storm Entity enters the battlefield. It will count spells that were cast while Storm Entity was on the stack.

card.name: Sudden Shock
card.ability:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Sudden Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
card.flavor: Arc mages aren't known for their patience.
